# BNNSGraph.Builder.OperationParameter

**Protocol**

A protocol that allows functions to accept either tensors or collections.

## Declaration

```swift
protocol OperationParameter<Element>
```

## Operators

- ***(_:_:)**: Adds an element-wise multiplication operation to the current graph.
- ***(_:_:)**: Adds an element-wise multiplication operation to the current graph.
- **+(_:_:)**: Adds an element-wise addition operation to the current graph.
- **+(_:_:)**: Adds an element-wise addition operation to the current graph.
- **-(_:_:)**: Adds an element-wise subtraction operation to the current graph.
- **-(_:_:)**: Adds an element-wise subtraction operation to the current graph.
- **/(_:_:)**: Adds an element-wise division operation to the current graph.
- **/(_:_:)**: Adds an element-wise division operation to the current graph.
- **%(_:_:)**: Adds an element-wise remainder of division operation to the current graph.

## Associated Types

- **Element**

## Instance Methods

- **graphBuilderTensor(_:)**: Returns a tensor for the specified BNNS Graph builder.

## Conforming Types

- BNNSGraph.Builder.Tensor
